name: Aria's Adventures
description:
Aria's Adventures is an exciting and educational app using the latest exciting and fun Virtual & Augmented Reality technologies, bringing modern-day and prehistoric animals to life inside your very own home!

Aria's Adventures consists of a set of unique animal cards which you can explore in both Virtual and Augmented Reality; this is accomplished by viewing the card either on a smartphone/tablet or with a smartphone through the Virtual Reality glasses which are included in the package. You will see each animal in 3D and animated; as you rotate and tilt each card you will see it from different angles.

Aria's Adventures features:

• 100 cards showing modern-day and prehistoric animals, in animated 3D using Virtual and Augmented Reality technologies

• Listen to each animal’s unique sound

• Stimulate kids to learn new animal’s name in English as well as Chinese

• Click the information button to hear some interesting fact about the animals in two languages

• Take a photo with your favorite animal and share it to Facebook

• Stimulate your children to learn new objects interactively by asking about different animals which they answer by showing the relevant card

Note: please download those markers in order to be able to play the game.
